column3: Glasgow School for Business and Society
column5: Modern, culturally diverse and dynamic business environments are growing globally and as a result, we are witnessing a surge in demand for graduates with a world view of what a successful business can look like.International business has experienced huge growth as a direct result of globalisation. Join Glasgow Caledonian University's Glasgow School for Business and Society and find a modern, international setting where ethical business practices are nurtured and international business theory is put to the test.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 16 months full-time; 2 years (with professional practice) full-time
